verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
The fight is on,
O Christian soldier,

And face to face
in stern array,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
With armor gleaming,
and colors streaming,
The right and wrong engage today!

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
The fight is on,
but be not weary;
Be strong and in His might hold fast;

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
If God be for us,
His banner o’er us,
We’ll sing the victor’s song at last!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The fight is on,
the trumpet sound is ringing out,

The cry “To arms!”
is heard afar and near;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The Lord of hosts
is marching on to victory,
The triumph of the Christ will soon appear.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
The fight is on,
Arouse, ye soldiers brave and true!

Jehovah leads,
and victory will assure;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: Go buckle on the armor God has given you,

And in His strength
unto the end endure.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: The Lord is leading on to certain victory;
The bow of promise spans the eastern sky;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: His glorious name in every land shall honored be;

The morn will break,
the dawn of peace is nigh.
